action_item: Users & Roles - Personalize the application settings for a better user experience.
notes: Focus on landing page customization and inbox cleanup.

action_item: Users & Roles - Uncheck the legacy search box to enhance patient record searches.
notes: This allows for more precise searches using multiple parameters.

action_item: Security - Change the main login password for enhanced security.
notes: Follow the straightforward process to update the password.

action_item: Security - Update the eSignature ID for document signing.
notes: Requires validation of current ID before creating a new one.

action_item: Security - Update the visual signature for documents.
notes: Validation needed using eSignature ID before drawing a new signature.

action_item: Reports - Customize clinical document templates using CCDA standards.
notes: Select and order sections of patient charts for summaries.
